post:
[ReadyDedis, LLC](https://readydedis.com/) - Dedicated Servers & Managed Support.

Hello,

Here are some tailored Black Friday offers for the LET community.

[Updated Every 12 hours - Grab em as they come!](https://readydedis.com/clients/cart.php?gid=11)


**About Us**
Currently, we're a team of 4 experienced individuals who've been exposed to servers, networking, and security. We're based out of India but our company is registered at Delaware, the US in 2018.

**24x7 Support**
Normally we have proactive monitoring in place for all our servers, even so, if you should face any problem we're always available on-call vide our phone number +1 302-597-7085 or our support platform via tickets.

**Payment Methods**
PayPal | Credit / Debit Card | Bitcoin | Alipay

**All orders are delivered within 24-72 hours**

**All the servers come with 1 hour managed support per month.**
